posts.caption: docs.emmet.io
posts.description: Basically, most text editors out there allow you to store and re-use commonly used code chunks, called“snippets”. While snippets are a good way to boost your productivity, all implementations have common pitfalls: you have to define the snippet first and you can’t extend them in runtime.

posts.caption: campaignmonitor.com
posts.description: Campaign Monitor makes it easy to attract new subscribers, send them beautiful email newsletters and see stunning reports on the results.
